name: Simple Gladiator v0.7
description:
Description

Simple Gladiator is a very simplistic, shooter-like game, mainly created for people to play in order to relax, destroy some enemies and get a well-deserved high score.


Story

You are a gladiator and the gods have chosen you to entertain them. Kill as many enemies as you can and survive as long as you can to earn the gods' appreciation. Don't forget, the god-tree spawns pills that you can eat to get more powerful.

Future updates will feature
  • Better sound effects and soundtrack.
  • More enemy types.
  • Better looking and more intelligent enemies.
  • Bosses and different arenas.
  • Portals.
  • Multiplayer mode, where you can fight your friends in the arena, and show them that even if they have a better high score, you are still better.
Rules
  • Have fun.
  • Brag about your high score.
Tell us about what is good and what is terrible

Please try out the game and comment about your experience. Don't forget, this is a work in development, so don't be rude (like you can do better).  If you have any ideas, or any comment about tweaks that should be made, your opinion is welcome.

Also, please comment about anything that is missing from this page. It will be updated in a short period of time.
